body.name: Colgate 360 Advanced Optic White, 4pk, Medium
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 20% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 28 mins
features: Whitening toothbrush with spiral polishing bristles
Advanced multi-action bristle design (vs. an ordinary flat trim toothbrush)
Innovative cheek and tongue cleaner design
Removes bacteria from teeth, tongue, cheeks, and gums
Comfortable ergonomic handle for better maneuvering
body.description: The Colgate 360⁰ Optic White Advanced medium whitening manual toothbrush features an advanced multi-action bristle design (vs. an ordinary flat trim toothbrush) and an innovative cheek & tongue cleaner design to remove bacteria from teeth, tongue, cheeks, and gums. The toothbrush also features spiral polishing bristles that help to remove surface stains from teeth, for a naturally whiter smile. It also features an ergonomic handle so that it fits comfortably in your hand. Flexible finger grips help the toothbrush to stay in place; reducing slippage and allowing for more precise maneuvering as you brush your teeth. Available in both soft and medium bristles.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #28,772 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #176 in Manual Toothbrushes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toothbrushes by a well trusted brand!
reviews.reviewText: Our household has been using Colgate products for years now and have been using these Colgate 360 Advanced Optic White toothbrushes for a while as well! These are the same as the older ones, just a “new look”!We really like them! These specific ones are medium and come in a 4 pack. They really work well, we won’t use any other brand for toothbrushes! They clean well (the best besides an electric toothbrush and personally, I prefer these over an electric toothbrush)!These are supposed to help your teeth stay white. They won’t whiten them, but will keep them at the whiteness you’re currently at (you’ll need whitening strips or a treatment to get them whiter than they are). BUT, if you have been using the wrong toothbrush(es) that really haven’t been cleaning your teeth well enough, these definitely may help your teeth appear whiter!The cheek and tongue cleaner are a bonus! Love them both!These toothbrushes last a while! Comfortable to hold! We have been ordering these for a long time and will continue to after these 4 are done! Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well Made, Very Scrubby, Excellent Handles!
reviews.reviewText: These are truly hearty toothbrushes. They are so well made that you will feel guilty ditching this after your next trip. I took one with me on vacation and expected to toss it as we prepared to leave. But, I liked it so much, I brought it home!These scrub really, really well! You are going to get that super clean feeling that you might experience with an electric toothbrush! And the handle is so solid and so grippy!The back of the toothbrush has those little nubs that are great for brushing your tongue. And, I love the clear resin that runs through this. Very aesthetically cool!If you are buying these for a trip, be ready ... I don't think you will be able to part with them! Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A true medium bristle
reviews.reviewText: I typically use soft bristle brushes but found I like incorporating this Colgate option weekly. It is effective and has a handy, built-in tongue scrubber which I love. You can absolutely tell the difference between this and a cheaper option. If you’re on the fence I definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I can't say this is what I expected as it's much better. I REALLY like the way this makes my teeth feel. It's a very different brushing experience. First, the head is definitely very unique compared to the dentist-supplied toothbrushes I've been using. It leaves my mouth feeling cleaner. Second, a lot of thought went into this brush in that even the back of the head is textured so it can be used as a tongue scraper. While I normally prefer an electric brush, when traveling or late at night when I don't want to disturb the family I use a manual brush. I can definitely say I'll be sticking to this one at those times from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great brush set!
reviews.reviewText: No complaints with these brushes. The bristle head is very soft and is easy on your gums, and still gets your teeth clean. Quality of the bristles is pretty good, they don't bend and lean apart at all after just a few brushes (or if you're like me and just heavy-handed!). The sharp indents on the ends make brushing in the crevices slightly better. The brush heads clean pretty good even if you rinse under the faucet, and don't stain at all. Grip on the handle is more comfortable and it fits most toothbrush holders if that interests you. Definitely not for kids, the handle is simply too much for them. But I like these, sometimes Colgate brushes are a huge miss yet these work better than expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent manual toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: With medium stiffness and one of the more aggressive brush designs, these are great at removing food debris from crowns and gaps while brushing at any angle, which is all that matters at the end of the day. The dual-sided silicone grips and stylish, ergonomic handle design are also nice touches. The whole "whiter smile" claim seems kinda hollow and they're not ideal for those with sensitive gums, but it's one of the best manual toothbrushes for the average person.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bristle design makes this the best manual toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: This is probably the best toothbrush head design for a manual toothbrush. The bristles on this have both round areas to help polish your teeth, that is, remove stains, and longer bristles to help remove particles that get in awkward spots. I also like that it has a tongue cleaner built in. It's great for travel, too, since you might not want to travel with an electric toothbrush and charging cable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good manual brushes
reviews.reviewText: Fairly priced, and high quality. I usually use an electric toothbrush but sometimes I'll use a manual, like when it needs to be recharged or if I'm on vacation. These fit the bill nicely and seem better than the cheap ones you get from the dentist for free. Comfortable handle, and substantial bristles. Would purchase again!
